Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees European and Japanese buyers: Taxes will be asked in the destination country. Please inquire at your local Customs Office before ordering as you will have to pay extra charges upon arrival of the parcel in your country Guitar comes with Gibson HSC in good working condition. Case has scratches and dings Overall condition: - Neck is straight - All electronics work as they should - Frets are the original ones and they ring out properly all over the fretboard. However they are very low and guitar will need a refret soon. - Lots of small scratches and light edgewear but nothing serious or too visible. - Gold hardware shows some patina but has nicely aged - One small ding and surface scratches on the back of the body but no buckle wear More pictures available upon request Guitar was made at the Kalamazoo Plant, MI, USA on January 8th, 1977 Production Number: 42 Specifications: - Weight: 10 lbs 12 oz - "C" Shape neck on the thinner side - 2 Gibson Series VII humbucking pickups and one (middle position) Gibson "Super Humbucking" pickup - Walnut stained top - Carved three-piece maple cap - Bound one piece mahogany back - Three-piece maple neck (five if you count the ‘wings’ for the headstock width) - Ebony fingerboard - Hearts-and-flowers mother of pearl inlay and script logo - Gold plated tuners with metal ‘tulip’ shaped buttons. - Gold-plated ABR Tune-o-Matic and stop tailpiece - Three gold-plated humbuckers, wired as other Gibson 3-pickup models with a 3-position selector switch. - This stock wiring gives Neck, Middle and Bridge, and Bridge selections. Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment. Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 1977 Gibson Les Paul Artisan 3-Pickup Walnut with HSC
